name: Assault from the Deep
overview: The war of the universe has been long and hard fought. The terrible enemy was nearly driven from the heavens when suddenly a new outbreak of violence and death broke out on the second star of planet Ceata. Secret ocean bases launched the newest, most powerful explosives known. Every missile meant death to millions. Push the joystick in the direction you want to fire and smash shooting saucers and missiles before they disappear out of range.
